sentence: Associated Press Heavily redacted records from 2001 incident at Walkers former home in a gated suburban Dallas subdivision adds another layer to an already turbulent personal history, which includes the former football stars acknowledged struggles with mental health, violent outbursts and accusations that he repeatedly threatened his ex-wife WASHINGTON (AP) One warm fall evening in 2001, police in Irving, Texas, received an alarming call from Herschel Walkers therapist.
